name: Reinado - Grand Apex - Gordo 6x60
additionalNotes:
Established in 2009 by its founder Antonio Lam, Reinado was formed as an alternative to the typical generic cigar in the retail space. With all of our premium brands, cigar smokers get well-aged tobacco, exclusive blends and quality of craftsmanship. In addition, Reinado is a proud supporter of Dementia 
After returning to the cigar industry in August 2021 with the Grand Apex, Antonio Lam has announced the second brand for his Reinado brand.Â As part of its return to the cigar industry, Reinado Cigars has announced that it now has an exclusive U.S. distribution partner, SZ Wholesale. Located in Bensalem, Pa., SZ Wholesale is a wholesaler for a number of premium cigar brands, as well as cigar accessory companies. Antonio said he feels strongly about the benefits that the relationship between the two companies will bring.
